com.carto.graphics

Class Frustum

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.carto.graphics.Frustum

  • public class Frustum
extends java.lang.Object
    A 3D frustum defined by 6 clipping planes.

      • circleIntersects

        public boolean circleIntersects(MapPos center,
                                double radius)
        Tests if a circle on the z = 0 plane inersects with the frustum.
        Parameters:
        center - The center position of the circle.
        radius - The radius of the circle.
        Returns:
        True if the circle intersects with the frustum.

                                double radius)
        Tests if a sphere inersects with the frustum.

        center - The center position of the sphere.
        radius - The radius of the sphere.
        Returns:
        True if the sphere intersects with the frustum.

      • squareIntersects

        public boolean squareIntersects(MapBounds square)
        Tests if an axis aligned square on the z = 0 plane inersects with the frustum.
        Parameters:
        square - The axis aligned square.
        Returns:
        True if the square intersects with the frustum.
